title: No unfiltered data file found
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description
I used DLC exactly like https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/master/docs/standardDeepLabCut_UserGuide.md .

When I run
```
deeplabcut.create_labeled_video(config_path, [video_path], save_frames=True)
```
or
```
deeplabcut.filterpredictions(config_path, [video_path])
```
or
```
deeplabcut.plot_trajectories(config_path, [video_path])
```

, I got the following error message.
```
No unfiltered data file found in /home/yueoka/dlc/sample1-yueoka-2022-02-01/videos for video mouse300_220120 and scorer DLC_resnet50_sample1Feb1shuffle1_750000.
```

How to fix this error ?
The steps before these commands are already failed ?

### Operating System

operating system：
```
$ cat /etc/issue
Ubuntu 20.04.3 LTS \n \l
```

### DeepLabCut version

dlc version
```
In [66]: deeplabcut.__version__
Out[66]: '2.2.0.6'
```

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

gpu: yes
|NVIDIA-SMI 470.86       Driver Version: 470.86       CUDA Version: 11.4 

### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_
